name: SET LINE
description: This command will set up the fields to be used in a LISTF/LISTM command as a First Line (FLINE).

parameters.name: recv_fld
parameters.description: The name of the field that will be used to hold the title list.

parameters.name: title_list
parameters.description: The list of fields, constants, and/or expressions that will make up this title line.

comments: This command will only work in conjunction with the LISTF command.
